products.name: Metallic Dog Cage
products.short_description: Durable and spacious metallic dog cage designed for comfort and security. Ideal for indoor and outdoor use.
products.description: This premium metallic dog cage provides a safe and secure space for your pet, whether at home or during travel. Crafted from sturdy metal, it’s built to last and offers ample ventilation for your dog’s comfort. Its portable design and easy-to-clean surface make it the perfect choice for pet owners seeking reliability and convenience.

products.name: Feedmixer and grinder
products.short_description: Efficient feed mixer and grinder for preparing nutrient-rich livestock feed. Saves time and effort.
products.description: The feed mixer and grinder combine robust mixing and grinding capabilities, ensuring evenly mixed, high-quality feed for livestock. It handles grains and feed ingredients effortlessly, improving efficiency and reducing preparation time. Designed for durability and ease of use, this machine is perfect for farms of all sizes.

products.name: 600kg Pellet Machine
products.short_description: High-capacity pellet machine producing 600kg of livestock feed per hour.
products.description: Boost your feed production with this 600kg pellet machine, perfect for creating consistent, nutrient-packed pellets for livestock. Built with industrial-grade materials, this machine offers high efficiency and durability. Whether for small or large-scale farming, it provides a cost-effective way to meet your feed needs.

products.name: 4.5 Tone Chaff Cutter Machine
products.short_description: Heavy-duty chaff cutter with a capacity of 4.5 tonnes per hour.
products.description: The 4.5-tonne chaff cutter machine is designed for large-scale agricultural operations. It cuts through fodder and grass effortlessly, ensuring uniform feed for livestock. With its robust build and impressive output, this machine saves time and reduces labor costs, making it an essential tool for progressive farms.

products.name: Diesel engine pelletizing machine
products.short_description: Reliable pelletizing machine powered by a diesel engine for off-grid use.
products.description: This diesel-powered pelletizing machine is perfect for farms without stable electricity supply. It efficiently converts feed ingredients into high-quality pellets, ensuring proper nutrition for livestock. Designed for rugged use, it’s a dependable solution for modern farming needs.

products.name: Multiple purpose chaff cutter
products.short_description: Versatile chaff cutter suitable for grass, straw, and silage preparation.
products.description: The multi-purpose chaff cutter is a must-have for any farmer looking to prepare livestock feed efficiently. It handles grass, straw, and silage with ease, delivering consistent results. With its compact design and powerful performance, it’s an excellent choice for small and large farms alike.

products.name: 1056 Egg Incubator
products.short_description: Fully automatic 1056-egg incubator for high-capacity hatching.
products.description: Maximize your poultry productivity with this 1056-egg incubator. It features advanced automation for temperature and humidity control, ensuring optimal hatching conditions. Ideal for commercial hatcheries, this incubator is designed for efficiency and reliability.

products.name: 80cm Chicken Plucker
products.short_description: Compact 528-egg incubator with fully automatic temperature control.
products.description: This 528-egg incubator is equipped with cutting-edge technology for precise temperature and humidity regulation. Its compact design makes it ideal for small to medium-scale hatcheries, ensuring high hatch rates with minimal effort.

products.name: 528egg Incubator Fully Automatic
products.short_description: Efficient and compact 528-egg incubator with fully automatic controls for high hatch rates.

Its compact design ensures it fits easily in your workspace while maintaining optimal performance. Built to maximize hatch rates with minimal effort, this incubator is a reliable choice for poultry farmers seeking efficiency and productivity.

Compact yet powerful, this incubator is an excellent choice for small-scale poultry farmers looking to maximize productivity with minimal hassle.

products.name: 150kg Extruder machine

Built for durability and ease of use, it reduces processing time and enhances productivity, making it a reliable choice for modern farming needs.
